p: Based on those findings, 3 patients with PD were co-administered 20 mg of febuxostat and 500 mg of Ino twice a day for 14 days. [ 40] The results suggested that the treatment may be effective, with 2 cases demonstrating improvement in 2 PD symptoms (decreased tremor and improved mobility) and 1 case showing improvement in 1 PD symptom (decreased tremor); adverse events were not observed (Unpublished data).
